title: Pediatric Asthma Score (PAS)
desc: The Pediatric Asthma Score stratifies asthma severity in children.

orgreference.text: Kelly CS, Andersen CL, Pestian JP. Improved outcomes for hospitalized asthmatic children using a clinical pathway. Ann Allergy Asthma Immunol. 2000;84(5):509–516.

other_refer.text: Nievas IFF, Anand KJS. Severe Acute Asthma Exacerbation in Children: A Stepwise Approach for Escalating Therapy in a Pediatric Intensive Care Unit.The Journal of Pediatric Pharmacology and Therapeutics : JPPT. 2013;18(2):88-104. doi:10.5863/1551-6776-18.2.88.
